summary: Diff implements a fixed bottom tab navigation (with Home/Discover/Create/Messages/Profile/Hub), adds bottom padding to prevent overlap, restores Profile route component wiring, and reintroduces DeedsBar usage tracking plus a Grade Deeds Report Card UI with a Rate Friend modal. Also includes several unrelated UI/feature changes (e.g., service worker recovery/update flows, multilingual/support/other app sections) not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Battery icon assets referenced by DeedsBar resolve correctly (no broken images).
missing_requirements.reason: DeedsBar references several /assets/generated/*.png paths, but the diff summary does not show any asset files added/verified, so asset existence cannot be confirmed from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker update detection/recovery flow (recovery cooldown/attempt tracking, update banner, startup recovery screen).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest focuses on reverting bottom navigation and restoring Profile/Deeds UI, and explicitly lists non-goals like adding new functionality beyond restoration.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("Service Worker Updates - Automatic update detection and recovery with reload guards")

hallucinated_features.description: Multilingual support (auto-detect and manual language switching).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any REQ; unrelated to navigation/profile/deeds restoration.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("Multilingual Support - Auto-detect and manual language switching (10 languages)")

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/maintenance of broad stub implementations for many unrelated domain features in query hooks (Blog, LiveSession, Marketplace, etc.) to maintain frontend compatibility.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly says not to implement new backend systems and to focus on restoring existing UI/behavior.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts": "comprehensive stub implementations for Post, Comment, Blog, LiveSession, Marketplace, and other features not yet in backend")

hallucinated_features.description: UI restyling/enhancements across Header/Footer/LoginPrompt/ProfileSetupModal/Feed/DiscoverFeed/CreatePostButton beyond the bottom-nav revert.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; REQ-1 asks to revert navigation to the previous layout rather than introduce new visual redesigns in multiple components.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for Header.tsx, Footer.tsx, LoginPrompt.tsx, ProfileSetupModal.tsx, Feed.tsx, DiscoverFeed.tsx, CreatePostButton.tsx, etc.)

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/featured app sections/routes beyond the requested router paths (e.g., /live, /blog, Marketplace, Space, AdminDashboard).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; REQ-1 specifies using existing router paths for the bottom navigation (/, /discover, /messages, /profile, /hub) and Create modal.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (imports/route definitions for LiveFeed, BlogPage, Marketplace, Space, AdminDashboard and routes like /live, /blog)
